text: Nagórnik is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Marciszów, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately north-east of Marciszów, north-east of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Nagórnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (001) jar.jpg|Bus stop File:Nagórnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (002) jar.jpg|Wayside shrine File:Nagórnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (006) jar.jpg|Old house ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Nagórnik, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
